column5: Finally got one worth taking a picture of, didn't think it was quite that long, but you can't stretch the stainless ruler
That is a nice'un!... and theyre some of the best eatin' fish you'll ever put in your mouth!
Nice slab!!
very nice slab for sure .  .....now go get a limit of those at 13inches and man what a meal that would be....WTG
nice one
nice fish
pretty crappie!
A few more that size would be just dandy.  Good shooting Fisherman.
Tasty little treat!
That's one hell of a crappie!
WTG on the slab crappie!
NIce Crappie.  Congrats.
Nice looking Crappie,congrats.  Steve
Holy Moly, that is a beauty crappie.  Well done.  Joey
nice looking crappie and it would be even nicer if you gave a little story on how you caught it ...just a few details....lol

There I wuz justa fishin on the ize, when all of a zudden, zing goes the drag, darn another boogger rocket, nooooo, it's a honkin crappie. A little bit of seesawing and fling...outa the hole he comes,  near landed right in my sleighbox.  Wasn't on Simcoe, or the river that comes in the south end.  I was sworn to secrecy or the other guy will stab me with a rusty fillet knife.
so you were fishing for pike and the crappie was a bonus fish....was it the only crappie you caught did you catch lots of pike..details are everthing around here..well pictures help too.....lol
Actually, it was the only crappie, 3 booger rockets, but the intent was to go and get a couple of perch just for a fishwich at lunch.  I might try Gilford area tomorrow if it's not too blustery out.

thanks for the report good luck at gilford.... there are tons of perch at gilford, as my camera showed, but type of bait/lure, size and color and action really makes a difference..if you aren't catching change baits often.....
did u catch the crappie icing it??
Icing it? yes ice fishing

Nice fish. I bet that'll be yummy. My Grandfather used to give us a big bag of crappie fillets every once in a while and I swear they were the best. Then I had some at my Dads and he makes this sweet tasting batter ........ best fish I ever had!
